author: .paulharris
content:
I get the pull mechanism... i guess we're looking more at updating configuration in use, so they wouldn't be using this api to access that data ( you have full write access, it would be bad...)
there are some configurations but I think a lot of people will never enable this keymanager, and will certainly not give full delete access to third parties...
At run time at the moment, VC doesn't really have an api, so there's that....
Also some of the talks this week have been around 'can we not have full knowledge of exactly where a validator key is please', and thats at odds with a pull mechanism potentially, it's going to be a pretty big discussion to watch i think...
